SEARCH

Class UserUtil

java.lang.Object
UserUtil
public final class UserUtil extends Object
The UserUtil class provides methods related to creating and managing User objects. It provides methods to read users and write user data to and from the user.csv file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserUtil()
    Constructs a new UserUtil object.

    Boolean
    createLecturer(String newLecturerID, String name, String password)

    static User
    findUser(String userID, String password, Map<String,Student> students, Map<String,Lecturer> lecturers)

    • findUser

      public static User findUser(String userID, String password, Map<String,Student> students, Map<String,Lecturer> lecturers)
      Checks if the given userID and password match the user in the map, and returns a User object (either Student or Lecturer) if it matches.
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID to check
      password - the password of user to check
      students - the map of students
      lecturers - the map of lecturers
      Returns:
      a User object if the user ID and password match the user in the map, null otherwise

    • createStudent

      public Boolean createStudent(String newStudentID, String name, String password)
      Returns true if the new student is created and saved to the student.csv file, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      newStudentID - the new student ID to create
      name - the name of the new student
      password - the password of the new student
      Returns:
      true if the new student is created and saved, false otherwise

    • createLecturer

      public Boolean createLecturer(String newLecturerID, String name, String password)
      Returns true if the new lecturer is created and saved to the lecturer.csv file, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      newLecturerID - the new lecturer ID to create
      name - the name of the new lecturer
      password - the password of the new lecturer
      Returns:
      true if the new lecturer is created and saved, false otherwise

    • IDTakenAlert

      public void IDTakenAlert()
      Displays alert message if the user ID is taken.
